Name: A Breeze from Faraway Shores
AttributesDescription:
When a Resonator inflicts Aero Erosion upon enemies, the active Resonator in the team gains 40% Aero DMG Bonus for 15s, stacking up to 3 times.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: He heard from his grandmother that birds could carry wishes from the mortal world to the heavens. From that moment on, he began carving birds day and night, hoping that the Sentinel would allow him to see his departed mother once more. When the chisel in his hand suddenly fell to the ground, he realized that it was the moment the Sentinel answered his wish.
ObtainedShowDescription: When a Resonator inflicts Aero Erosion upon enemies, the active Resonator in the team gains 40% Aero DMG Bonus for 15s, stacking up to 3 times.
